page.title: 07SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: We wanted to find out how long most people have lived in{Yate}and why they moved here.We took home questionaires and asked our parents and people we knew.We found that 52% of the people we asked had lived here for over 10 years,22% for less than 5 years and 27% had lived in{Yate}for between 5 and 10 years.Most people had moved here because there is a wide range of low cost housing,but employment nearby,families nearby, the facilities in{Yate}and the nearness of{Bristol}were also important. Claire Jackson St Mary's
